description:
Migrant background

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
Families/never-married children with a migrant background
are parent-child communities/never-married children where at
least one parent has a foreign citizenship or attained
German citizenship by way of naturalisation or, as in the
case of ethnic German repatriates, by similar measures.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Migrant background
